title: Crypto-artifacts
synopsis: Here we research about [[Collectibles]], cryptoartifacts, and the [[Origins of Money]].

title: Holochain
synopsis: Holographic storage for distributed applications. A holochain is a validating distributed hash table (DHT) where every node enforces validation rules on data against the signed chains where the data originated - [http://ceptr.org/projects/holochain ceptr.org]

title: Holochain vs Blockchain
synopsis: Co-Founder [[Arthur Brock]] discusses the fundamental differences between [[Holochain]] and [[Blockchain]] - [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JV8QZsNpFok youtube.com]

title: Search for 'ethereumm'

title: Secure Scuttlebutt
synopsis: Scuttlebutt has a number of similarities with [[holochain]]. It is a decent(ralised) secure gossip platform. Historically, sea-slang for gossip - a scuttlebutt is basically a watercooler on a ship.

title: São Paulo
synopsis: São Paulo (; Portuguese pronunciation: [sɐ̃ʊ̯ ˈpaʊ̯lʊ] ( listen)) is a municipality in the southeast region of Brazil. The metropolis is an alpha global city (as listed by the GaWC) and is the most populous city in Brazil and the Americas, as well as in the Southern Hemisphere. The municipality is also the largest in the Americas and Earth's 13th largest city proper by population. title: Welcome Visitors
synopsis: Welcome to this site for the [[Crypto Academy]]. Our aim is to broaden the open understanding of [[cryptography]], and [[privacy]] to as large an audience as possible.
